CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 27, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Together Sixty-Eight Years - Friends and relatives from far and near gathered at the home of the C. William Ecksteins of Bryant Street last Sunday evening to honor one of the community's best-loved couples, Mr. and Mrs. Charles Waters, who celebrated their sixty-eighth wedding anniversary. Photo shows, left to right, back row: Joseph Waters, Nelson Waters, James Mathews. Front row, Mrs. Nelson Waters, Mr. and Mrs. Charles Waters and Mrs. Joseph Waters. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Waters and Charles Waters cutting wedding cake on their sixty-eighth anniversary, surrounded by others including Mrs. Waters, Joseph Waters, Nelson Waters, James Mathews and Mrs. Waters in home of C. William Eckstein, Bryant Street, Highland Park
